original: 泰山平陽人，鮑信之弟。與其兄鮑信響應討董，汴水之役隨曹操進攻董卓將領徐榮，與衛茲一同戰死。《三國演義》中為鮑忠，為華雄所殺。
text: Taishan Pingyang, the younger brother of Bao Xin. He and his brother Bao Xin responded to the question of Dong, and the Battle of Bianshui followed Cao Cao to attack Dong Zhuo's general Xu Rong and died together with Weitz. In The Romance of the Three Kingdoms, Bao Zhong was killed by Hua Xiong.
